name: crocheted project bag
sizes_available: approximately 22” / 56cm in width (diameter) and 14.5” / 37cm in length when laid flat, from center of bag base to folded edge of drawstring channels
notes:
learn to crochet by whipping up a beginner-friendly crocheted project bag! i designed this bag after finding some unloved cotton yarn in my stash and deciding to make something with it that was simple but very usable.

our free pattern comes with an accompanying step-by-step video tutorial to walk you though everything you need to know. if you’re new to crochet don’t worry, the project only requires a few easy stitches. once it’s finished, you can use your new crocheted project bag to store whatever other small crafts you’re working on!
